entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:21 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
